text: (atarku iraivan, avvarayin avarkalukku vakkalikkappatta) â€˜â€˜anta itam narpatu varutankal varai avarkalukku niccayamakat tatukkappattu vittatu. (Atuvarai) avarkal pumiyil tattali(ntu kettalai)varkal. Akave, (intap) pavikalana makkalaip parri nir kavalai kollatir!'' Enru (musavukkuk) kurinan
